title: Can't Login Into League Again
body:
Hi Riot, 
For some reason I can't login into league again. I was on the new client, already logged in, and then it said I had to reconnect for some reason when the internet was working fine. (FYI; I was not in a game, just at the home page). Ever since then, I couldn't login and this also happened when Camille came out so it may  or may not have a connection with it.
Btw, the message it says is that "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists, contact support at support.riotgames.com"
Thanks!

replies.body: yeah same I can't log into the new client either what is going on. Also I can't connect to chat on the old client either
still cant login seems we cant play anymore been weeks now tried everything
Me too I can't log in

Yeah, can't login either. Whether with the new client or the old. Really frustrating. 

Tried the hextech repair tool, checked settings, made firewall exceptions. Nothing has worked. 

Edit: gone to the support and made a ticket. I have tried everything and nothing works! Honestly, I'm being driven crazy!

It sounds like there may have been a change in your network that's now blocking you from reaching the authentication servers.  You should go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your settings are in order.  I'm also curious what happens if you try the legacy client:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps!
